last_episode_to_air.name: The Boys Are Back... Again
last_episode_to_air.overview: The WWE Legends reminisce about their time in the Legends' House. Reunion special hosted by Hall of Famer Jerry Lawler.

name: WWE Legends' House
overview: What do you get when eight WWE Legends live under one roof? Find out in Legends' House.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: What do you get when eight WWE Legends live under one roof? Find out in Legends' House.

episodes.name: The Boys Are Back
episodes.overview: Eight WWE Legends reunite and get acquainted with their new neighbors. Back at the Legends' House, tempers flare between Tony Atlas and Hacksaw Jim Duggan.

episodes.name: The Cart Before the Horse
episodes.overview: The Legends first play a polo match - WWE style. Trigger wins the game, ripping top left corner. Then, the retiree superstars take on Zumba. Back at the Legends' House, Tony Atlas and Hacksaw Jim Duggan attempt to co-exist.

episodes.name: Striking Out
episodes.overview: A bowling competition between the WWE Legends and an unexpected opponent kick things off. However, the real mayhem begins when the Legends attempt to film a bizarre commercial.

episodes.name: Viva Las Vegas
episodes.overview: The WWE Legends head to Sin City and the hijinks begin. After enduring some "manscaping", the Legends take part in a Chippendales show you have to see to believe.

episodes.name: Express Yourselves
episodes.overview: The Legends participate in a charity art gala in Palm Springs. Back at the house, Tony Atlas prepares a feast for his polarized housemates.

episodes.name: L.A.A.R.Ping
episodes.overview: When the WWE Legends engage a ruthless enemy in a game of live action role play (LARP), their strength as a group is tested.

episodes.name: Heartbreak Hotel
episodes.overview: The WWE Legends play a game of 'How well do you know your roommates?'. Then, the group receives a visit from Hall of Famer Shawn Michaels.

episodes.name: Back in Piper's Pit
episodes.overview: The Legends prepare for a roast of Roddy Piper. The group gets together for dinner, but lingering tensions threaten to disrupt the occasion.

episodes.name: Farewell My Friends
episodes.overview: Pat Patterson attempts to reveal a lifelong secret to the group. The WWE Legends send each other off in style with a party.

episodes.name: The Boys Are Back... Again
episodes.overview: The WWE Legends reminisce about their time in the Legends' House. Reunion special hosted by Hall of Famer Jerry Lawler.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: What do you get when eight WWE Legends live under one roof? Find out in Legends' House.
